attributes.action: reject the proposals to cut maternity services at Solihull Hospital and to ensure that Solihull Hospital is sufficiently funded and equipped so that it is able to provide a full range of maternity services for local people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Local MP Lorely Burt is fighting to save Soliull's threatened maternity services. Government plans could mean a 75% cut in the number of births at the local hospital. Thousands of local mothers will be forced to travel outside the Borough to give birth.

By signing this petition, you can support Lorely's campaign to protect our local health services
